code: import React from'react';import'./Dashboard.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Dashboard=function Dashboard(){var products=[{name:'Product A',revenue:5000,cost:4000},{name:'Product B',revenue:7000,cost:5500},{name:'Product C',revenue:4000,cost:3200},{name:'Product D',revenue:9000,cost:7500},{name:'Product E',revenue:12000,cost:11000}];var totalRevenue=products.reduce(function(acc,curr){return acc+curr.revenue;},0);var totalCost=products.reduce(function(acc,curr){return acc+curr.cost;},0);var totalProfit=totalRevenue-totalCost;var profitMargin=(totalRevenue-totalCost)/totalRevenue*100;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Product Profit/Loss Statistics"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Product"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Revenue"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Cost"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Profit/Loss"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Profit Margin"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:products.map(function(product){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:product.revenue}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:product.cost}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:product.revenue-product.cost}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[((product.revenue-product.cost)/product.revenue*100).toFixed(1),"%"]})]},product);})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tfoot",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:"Total"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:totalRevenue}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:totalCost}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:totalProfit}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[profitMargin.toFixed(2),"%"]})]})})]})]});};export default Dashboard;
